18uint8_t SPIClass::transfer(uint8_t tx_val) {
19 uint8_t rx;
20 furi_hal_spi_bus_trx(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_external, &tx_val, &rx, 1, SPI_TIMEOUT);
21 return rx;
22}

29 furi_hal_spi_acquire(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_external);
30 return;
31}
